title: Fix deployment error

requirements.text: Investigate and resolve the deployment error that occurred when pushing the application to the Internet Computer network
acceptanceCriteria: The application deploys successfully without errors
All backend canisters are properly installed and running
Frontend canister serves the application correctly

requirements.text: Verify that the backend main.mo actor compiles without syntax errors or type mismatches

requirements.text: Ensure frontend build process completes successfully with all TypeScript files compiling without errors
